scripts.build: npm run build:platform && npm run build:internal
scripts.preview:platform: npm run build:platform && npx @redocly/cli preview-docs dist/platform.yml
scripts.preview:internal: npm run build:internal && npx @redocly/cli preview-docs dist/internal.yml
scripts.preview:scheduler: npm run build:scheduler && npx @redocly/cli preview-docs cycle-scheduler-api
scripts.preview:ial: npm run build:ial && npx @redocly/cli preview-docs cycle-ial
